auth.unauthorized: You're unauthorized to proceed with this action

headings.noStores: You have no stores yet, start with creating one

desc.existingStore: Manage your items, reservation in already existing store
desc.newStore: Create new store for your business

generalInfo.title: General info
generalInfo.desc: Enter information about your company, link to logo, and choose color theme

flexibility.title: Time Frame Flexibility
flexibility.desc: Select whether an item reservation timeframe should be predetermined and fixed, or if the user has the flexibility to choose according to their preferences.
flexibility.flexibleDesc: Flexible value means that the item can be reserved for a period chosen by user within specified time frames.
flexibility.fixedDesc: Fixed value indicates that the item has fixed start and end times set by an admin, and users can only sign up for the entire duration.

granularity.title: Time Interval Restriction
granularity.desc: This setting decides the flexibility in the length of time an item can be reserved. Item can be booked for granular time intervals or allow user to freely choose reservation time ranges
granularity.granularDesc: Granular should be chosen if you want the item to be booked for multiplication of specific time intervals, like an hour.
granularity.continuousDesc: Continuous should be chosen if you want to allow reservations for any length of time. This offers more flexibility for the user.

allowOverNight.title: Overnight access
allowOverNight.desc: Select whether user could have access to an item outside of open hours.
allowOverNight.yesDesc: If yes, user can mantain access to an item outside of store open hours. It is best suited for hotels, and multiday rental (eq. cars)
allowOverNight.noDesc: If no, user can only rent items for time frames within open hours of rental place

simultaneous.title: Simultaneous Access
simultaneous.desc: This field determines whether multiple users can be signed up for an item at the same time. It is crucial for managing the accessibility of your item.
simultaneous.sharedDesc: Shared access should be chosen if you want multiple individuals to access the item simultaneously. This is best suited for items that can be shared, like a public spaces.
simultaneous.exclusiveDesc: Exclusive access should be chosen if you want allow only one user at the time to access the item, ensuring that the user has the item all to themselves.

uniqueness.title: Item Uniqueness
uniqueness.desc: This option defines whether the item is a unique entity or if there are multiple indistinguishable items available for users.
uniqueness.yesDesc: You have one specific item of a type. This is best suited for unique items or services.
uniqueness.noDesc: There are multiple, identical items available. This is best suited for items like chairs in a rental place.

specificReservation.title: Specific Reservation
specificReservation.desc: This field defines whether users can book specific parts of an item, eq. seats for a movie.
specificReservation.yesDesc: Select yes if you want users to reserve specific places or parts within an item. This is best suited for venues with specific seating.
specificReservation.noDesc: Select no if you want the item or event to be treated as a whole, with no sub-item reservations possible.

periodicity.title: Event Periodicity
periodicity.desc: This field determines the cyclical nature of events or bookings.
periodicity.cyclicDesc: Cyclical events are best suited for events that recur over time. User can view and book different instances of the same event.
periodicity.noncyclicDesc: Non cyclical events are best suited for one-time events or items. Each item is treated as a separate entity without any grouping.

customAttributes.title: Add attributes
customAttributes.desc: Define attributes with which you want to define in your items. Choose if they are obligatory, if they should be enabled in filtering, choose the visibility on main and item detail pages and if ou want define possible values
customAttributes.name: Attribute name
customAttributes.predefinedValuesPlaceholder: Enter predefined values by typing them and pressing enter

mainPage.title: Main Page Features
mainPage.desc: Enter welcome texts, and define visibility of features on the main page
mainPage.showTitle: Display title for item in items list
mainPage.subtitle: Display subtitle for item in items list
mainPage.image: Display item images in items list
mainPage.rating: Display ratings for each items - this option will allow users to rate your items

detailsPage.title: Details Page
detailsPage.desc: Define visibility of features on item details page, decide if you want to have ratings and comments in your store. Also, if you want to override reservation prompts for your system, enter them below.
detailsPage.subtitle: Display item's subtitle
detailsPage.rating: Display ratings - this option will allow users to rate your items
detailsPage.comments: Display comments/reviews - this option will allow users to add comments your items

authConfig.title: User Authentication
authConfig.desc: Choose what data is required from users when reserving items
authConfig.requiredDataLabel: What data is required when reserving?
authConfig.requiredDataPlaceholder: Enter predefined values by typing them and pressing enter
authConfig.confirmation: Is confirmation by an admin required for reservations?

add.requiredDataMissingDesc: Fill all the necessary fields to proceed

reschedule.conflictingReservationsDesc: Cannot reschedule because of the following reservations:

form.continuousDesc: Define time ranges from which users can freely choose their preferred reservation time.
form.slotsDesc: Define time slots users can reserve.
form.fixedDesc: Define time range for your item.
form.title: Title
form.subtitle: Subtitle
